action.action-desc: Mr. Steube introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To require a report from the Director of the Secret Service on illicit use of controlled substances at the Executive Residence.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Helping Understand Narcotics Traces at the Executive Residence Act of 2023 or as the HUNTER Act of 2023.

section.header: Report on illicit use of controlled substances in the White House
section.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Director of the Secret Service shall submit a report to Congress on the illicit use of controlled substances present at the White House, which shall includeâ€”

paragraph.text: steps taken to avoid controlled substances from coming into the White House;
vulnerabilities where drugs can make its way into the White House;
a full account of the investigation into the cocaine found at the White House in 2023; and
recommendations on how Congress can provide oversight or resources to prevent illicit usage of controlled substances in the Executive Branch.
